title: Game terrorists
body: Promos to gold five, one game left, but this Jhin threatens to afk unless I tell this guy to ‘go die have cancer’ to one of my teamates. I really hope I don’t get banned for this.

replies.body: IKIK that i shouldnt listen to the trollâ€™s threat and that it will affect me more than the troll. Well I submitted a ticket and reported the player, hopefully the troll gets what he deserves.

Probably the worst thing you can do in that kind of situation is doing what they're telling you to do. For one thing, it means you (more than likely) will get punished, because they *will* report you and that kind of thing (in this case, "suicide encouragement") is taken very seriously by Riot, and can often lead to escalation of punishment tiers. Not only that, it gives them the exact response they're looking for, which will only reinforce the behaviour. I know it must suck like hell to risk a ranked game, especially a promo game, because some c*nt is "holding the team hostage", but you'd only be making things worse for more players in the long run by "buying into" their toxicity, as well as risking your account.

Definitely report such players in the post-game lobby, and even by submitting a ticket via [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) if you feel you need to (I'd recommend it), explaining the situation as best you can, and providing screenshots if possible.
